imageScaleMethod.title: Image Scale Method
imageScaleMethod.description: 'fit' ensures the image always fits the screen. 'fitNoUpscale' works like 'fit' but will never upscale the image. 'zoom' the image will always fill the full screen, this may cause the image to be zoomed in and cropped
